content: अतिपातः {@--1@} Passing away, lapse (of time); अहो काल° तः <ls>Māl. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Neglect, omission; transgression; न चेदन्यकार्यातिपातः <ls>Ś. 1</ls> if no other duty be neglected thereby, if it should not interfere with (the discharge of) any other duty; deviation from established laws or customs. {@--3@} Befalling, occurrence; दुःखातिपातेन कलुषीकियंते <ls>K. 289</ls>; जलधारातिपातः <ls n="K.">302</ls> falling. {@--4@} Ill-treatment, or usage. {@--5@} Opposition, contrariety.
